plugins.name: NoMoreWrite-我不想再手写填充文本了！
plugins.description:
NoMoreWrite

一款帮助设计师快速填充文本的 Figma 插件。

功能特性

支持多行业数据生成

常用信息（姓名、电话号码、地址等）

物联网行业（设备信息、产品类型等）

金融信息（账户、交易等）

电商行业（商品、物流等）

用户行为（评论、访问等）

社交媒体账号（用户名、昵称等）

智能数据生成

真实的中文姓名组合

格式正确的电话号码和身份证号码

合理的地址信息

多样的商品名称

便捷的操作体验

分类展示，便于快速查找

支持批量填充

支持序号自动递增

新增功能

支持自定义文本填充

可输入多行文本

自动循环填充

支持在容器内批量填充

增强的数据生成器

新增物联网设备类型

优化地址生成算法

纳入更多社交媒体账号类型

版本

当前版本：1.2.0

使用方法

在 Figma 中选择文本图层。

打开插件面板。

选择所需的数据类型。

点击相应按钮填充数据。

更新日志

修复了模块加载问题。

优化了错误处理机制。

1.1.0

新增自定义文本填充功能。

增强了数据生成器。

优化了用户界面。

1.0.0

初始版本发布。

支持多行业数据生成。

优化了用户界面。

新增物联网设备类型数据。

plugins.name: Fast make grid
plugins.description:
🎛️ Grid Generator

Grid Generator es una herramienta que diseñé para crear grillas dinámicas y bien estructuradas basadas en frameworks populares como Bootstrap y Foundation. Mi objetivo fue simplificar la configuración de columnas, breakpoints y márgenes para tus diseños, garantizando precisión y ahorrándote tiempo.


Ya sea que estés trabajando en un diseño responsive, configurando un sistema de diseño o ajustando márgenes precisos, Grid Generator te ofrece la flexibilidad que necesitas para que te concentres en lo importante: ¡diseñar! ✨


✅ Soporte para Frameworks Populares

Genera grillas ajustadas a los breakpoints de:

  1. Bootstrap: Desde xs hasta xxl.
  2. Foundation: Desde small hasta xlarge.


✅ Contenedores Dinámicos

Configura contenedores:

  1. Fixed: Se ajusta al ancho del breakpoint seleccionado.
  2. Fluid: Se adapta al ancho completo del frame.


✅ Márgenes Automáticos

Agrega márgenes externos dinámicos en contenedores Fixed, calculados según el framework seleccionado:

  1. Bootstrap: 12px por lado.
  2. Foundation: 16px por lado.


✅ Cálculo Preciso de Columnas

El plugin ajusta el tamaño de las columnas automáticamente según el ancho disponible, restando márgenes y gutters para garantizar una alineación perfecta.


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Selecciona un Frame
  2. Asegúrate de tener un frame seleccionado para aplicar la grilla.
  3. Configura la Grilla
  4. Escoge un framework (Bootstrap o Foundation).
  5. Selecciona un breakpoint.
  6. Define el tipo de contenedor (Fixed o Fluid).
  7. Elige el número de columnas (4 o 12).
  8. Haz clic en "Generar Grilla" para aplicar la configuración al frame.


Opcional: Agregar Márgenes

Si el contenedor es Fixed, usa el botón "Agregar Márgenes" para incluir márgenes externos a los extremos.


Si tienes consejos o mejoras me dejas un comentario!!!
plugins.tagline: Crea grillas rapidamente en un frame para tus diseños responsivos

plugins.name: Rastarizer
plugins.description:
Rastarizer simplifies your workflow by converting Figma frames, components, and instances into optimized raster images. Simply add "-x" to the name of any frame, component, or instance you want to include in the conversion. Your originals remain intact and are only hidden during the process - easily restored with a single click. Perfect for preparing slides for PDF export or creating static versions of your designs.


Features include:

  1. One-click conversion of frames, components, and instances to images
  2. Adjustable resolution (1x to 3x)
  3. Automatic size optimization
  4. Easy toggle between original and rasterized versions
  5. Progress tracking for batch processing
  6. Non-destructive workflow (originals preserved)


Disclaimer: This plugin is provided "as is" without any warranties. The developer is not responsible for any issues that may arise from its use. Users are advised to maintain backups of their work.
plugins.tagline: Convert frames, components, and instances to high-quality raster images with a single click

plugins.name: 暗色组件助手 Dark Mode Assistant for Components
plugins.description:
介绍

“暗色组件助手”插件旨在简化在 Figma 组件中管理暗黑模式的过程。通过几次点击，你可以快速启用任何选中组件或实例的暗黑模式，同时如果可用，插件会应用组件库中的暗色 token 设置。


功能说明

  1. 自动检测并启用选中组件和实例的暗黑模式。
  2. 递归检查并更新嵌套在组和框架中的所有组件的暗黑模式。
  3. 允许你将组件库中的“暗色” token 应用于外观模块。
  4. 与具有“componentProperties”和“appearance”模块的组件兼容。


使用方法

  1. 选中你希望应用暗黑模式的组件、组或框架。
  2. 点击插件按钮，插件会自动为所有选中的元素及其子元素启用暗黑模式。
  3. 插件会自动应用暗黑模式设置，并在可用的情况下将其链接到组件库中的“暗色”token。


注意事项

  1. 插件最佳工作效果是在具有属性定义的组件库中使用。
  2. 如果未找到“appearance”模块，插件仍然会启用暗黑模式，但不会应用 token。
  3. 确保你的组件已正确链接到包含暗黑模式 token 的组件库，以获得完整功能。


Introduction

The "Dark Mode Assistant for Components" plugin is designed to streamline the process of managing dark mode properties in Figma components. With just a few clicks, you can quickly enable dark mode for any selected component or instance, while also applying the appropriate token settings for dark mode if available.


Function Description

  1. Automatically detects and enables dark mode for selected components and instances.
  2. Recursively checks and updates dark mode for all nested components within groups and frames.
  3. Allows you to apply the "dark" token from your component library's appearance module.
  4. Works seamlessly with components that have "componentProperties" and "appearance" modules.


How to Use

  1. Select the components, groups, or frames that you want to apply dark mode to.
  2. Click the plugin button to enable dark mode for all selected elements and their children.
  3. The plugin will automatically apply the dark mode setting and, if available, link it to the "dark" token in your component library.


Precautions

  1. The plugin works best with components that have properties defined in the component library.
  2. If no "appearance" module is found, the plugin will still enable dark mode but will not apply the token.
  3. Ensure that your components are correctly linked to a component library with dark mode tokens for full functionality.

136390.description:
介绍

“暗色组件助手”插件旨在简化在 Figma 组件中管理暗黑模式的过程。通过几次点击，你可以快速启用任何选中组件或实例的暗黑模式，同时如果可用，插件会应用组件库中的暗色 token 设置。


功能说明

  1. 自动检测并启用选中组件和实例的暗黑模式。
  2. 递归检查并更新嵌套在组和框架中的所有组件的暗黑模式。
  3. 允许你将组件库中的“暗色” token 应用于外观模块。
  4. 与具有“componentProperties”和“appearance”模块的组件兼容。


使用方法

  1. 选中你希望应用暗黑模式的组件、组或框架。
  2. 点击插件按钮，插件会自动为所有选中的元素及其子元素启用暗黑模式。
  3. 插件会自动应用暗黑模式设置，并在可用的情况下将其链接到组件库中的“暗色”token。


注意事项

  1. 插件最佳工作效果是在具有属性定义的组件库中使用。
  2. 如果未找到“appearance”模块，插件仍然会启用暗黑模式，但不会应用 token。
  3. 确保你的组件已正确链接到包含暗黑模式 token 的组件库，以获得完整功能。


Introduction

The "Dark Mode Assistant for Components" plugin is designed to streamline the process of managing dark mode properties in Figma components. With just a few clicks, you can quickly enable dark mode for any selected component or instance, while also applying the appropriate token settings for dark mode if available.


Function Description

  1. Automatically detects and enables dark mode for selected components and instances.
  2. Recursively checks and updates dark mode for all nested components within groups and frames.
  3. Allows you to apply the "dark" token from your component library's appearance module.
  4. Works seamlessly with components that have "componentProperties" and "appearance" modules.


How to Use

  1. Select the components, groups, or frames that you want to apply dark mode to.
  2. Click the plugin button to enable dark mode for all selected elements and their children.
  3. The plugin will automatically apply the dark mode setting and, if available, link it to the "dark" token in your component library.


Precautions

  1. The plugin works best with components that have properties defined in the component library.
  2. If no "appearance" module is found, the plugin will still enable dark mode but will not apply the token.
  3. Ensure that your components are correctly linked to a component library with dark mode tokens for full functionality.

manifest.name: 暗色组件助手 Dark Mode Assistant for Components

136390.release_notes: Update the cover and add a usage demo video
136390.tagline: Dark Mode Assistant for Components: Easily Toggle Dark Mode

plugins.name: in any case
plugins.description:
From effortless case changes to instant text metrics, this plugin integrates perfectly with both Figma and FigJam, adapting to your workflow and style. Simplify your design process and keep your text consistent, no matter the case!


Apply the most popular case transformations with ease, including Title Case, Sentence case, UPPERCASE, lowercase, tOOGLE cASE, camelCase, kebab-case, snake_case, PascalCase, and flatcase. Easily convert the case of text across multiple layers, components, and instances at once, with maintaining your font styles and formatting while making those changes.


  1. Access case conversion and text stats instantly through the actions menu, speeding up your workflow. Simply use Cmd + / on Mac or Ctrl + / on Win
  2. View character, word, sentence, and paragraphs counts, which dynamically update as you type or select text
  3. See the results of your case changes immediately
  4. Enjoy full functionality in both Figma and FigJam
  5. Continue working in your preferrable Dark or Light modes with native Figma colors
  6. Rest assured that your data is safe – this plugin doesn’t store or send any of your text or design data

plugins.name: Typography Style Guide Creator
plugins.description:
Typography Style Guide Creator is a powerful Figma plugin that helps designers streamline their typography workflow by automatically generating text styles from existing designs. Stop manually recreating text styles and let this plugin do the heavy lifting.

With Typography Style Guide Creator, you can transform any frame containing text elements into a complete typography system that's integrated directly into your Figma styles. Simply select a frame with your text designs, run the plugin, and watch as your typography system comes to life.

Key Features


Instant Style Generation: Convert manually created text elements into reusable Figma text styles with one click

Smart Name Recognition: Uses your text layer names as style names for better organization

Duplicate Detection: Intelligently identifies and merges duplicate styles to keep your design system clean

Visual Style Preview: See all created styles in an intuitive interface before applying them

Seamless Integration: Styles are added directly to your Figma document's style library


How It Works


Select a Frame: Choose any frame containing your text elements

Name Your Layers: Ensure text layers have descriptive names (e.g., "Heading/H1", "Body/Regular")

Run the Plugin: Click "Create Styles" to generate your typography system

Done!: Your text styles are now available in your Figma document


Perfect For


Design teams establishing consistent typography systems

Designers converting existing designs into organized style guides

Design system maintainers looking to formalize typography rules

Anyone who wants to save time on manual style creation


Save Hours of Design Work

Typography Style Guide Creator eliminates the tedious process of manually creating and managing text styles. What would normally take hours can now be done in seconds, allowing you to focus on what matters most—designing great experiences.
plugins.tagline: Turn your text designs into organized typography styles with a single click

plugins.name: MarkCraft
plugins.description:
As tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and other AI chats become an everyday part of our creative workflow, we’re constantly generating content in Markdown — ideas, research, notes, and UI copy. But bringing that content into Figma usually means losing all formatting. MarkCraft bridges that gap, turning raw Markdown into beautifully styled, editable text — so your insights look as good as your designs.


Headings, bold, italics, and lists are automatically applied using Figma’s native text features — no manual styling needed. Craft better content inside Figma — with just one click.


⚡ Key Features

Easy Edit

Convert Markdown into fully formatted Figma text — and keep editing like any native text layer.


Smart Lists

Supports clean bulleted and numbered lists (single-level only for V1).


Text Styling

Automatically applies headings, bold, italic — directly into Figma’s text nodes.


Auto Layout Friendly

Generates tidy, responsive frames ready for layout and resizing.
plugins.tagline: Markdown to Figma Made Effortless

plugins.name: Text Localizer
plugins.description:
🚀 Simplify your localization workflow with our powerful Figma plugin!


The Localization Plugin scans all text layers within a selected frame and automatically binds them to Figma variables, making it effortless to manage translations and text updates. Whether you're working on multilingual designs or simply organizing your text layers more efficiently, this tool streamlines the process.


✨ Features:

✅ Scan Selected Frames – Instantly detect all text layers within a frame.

✅ Bind Text to Variables – Assign Figma variables to text layers for seamless localization.

✅ Export & Manage Text Layers – Save and load text layer collections with ease.

✅ CSV Export Support – Quickly export text data for external use.


🔍 How It Works:

1️⃣ Select a frame in Figma.

2️⃣ Open the Localization Plugin.

3️⃣ Scan the selected frame for text layers.

4️⃣ Bind text layers to variables or export them as CSV.

5️⃣ Apply changes instantly and manage text efficiently!


🌟 New Features (Version 1.2.0)

Smart Layer Selection: The plugin now automatically detects and unselects text layers that are already bound to variables, preventing accidental duplication and redundant work.

Visual Binding Indicators: Text layers that are already bound to variables are now clearly marked with a purple variable icon in a light green background, making it easier to identify localized content.

Improved UI Elements: Count badges in the "Generate Variables" button now have a more polished, pill-shaped design that follows Figma's design patterns.


✨ Improvements (Version 1.2.0)

Automatic UI Update: The interface now automatically refreshes after generating variables to show accurate binding status.

Better Visual Hierarchy: The redesigned interface makes it clearer which layers are available for localization and which are already handled.

Enhanced Tooltips: Added helpful tooltips to explain why certain layers are pre-unselected.


🛠️ Technical Updates (Version 1.2.0)

Async Layer Scanning: Layer scanning now uses async/await for improved performance and reliability.

Optimized Variable Detection: More robust detection of bound variables for accurate status representation.
plugins.tagline: Streamline your Figma design localization process

plugins.name: Extract content strings
plugins.description:
Read the post and documentation for this plugin.

Download a test file.


This Figma plugin helps you surface and extract content strings from your designs by scanning your Figma file for text layer names containing unique IDs, making it easy to copy and paste content strings for use outside of Figma.


How this plugin works

This plugin scans text layers on the current page of Figma file for content that matches the prefix of the unique ID (e.g., “content_string_”) you define. Most developers rely on prefixes to organize and manage these strings, and a typical content string might look something like this:


key: 'user.profile.settings.modal.description'

value: 'Adjust your profile settings'

context: 'A brief description indicating the purpose of the modal.'


A content string can include additional details, like the “context” in this example, but it must always contain a unique ID (sometimes referred to as a key, ID, or token) and the actual content, often called the value:


key: 'user.profile.settings.modal.description'

value: 'Adjust your profile settings'


Developers use the unique ID in their code to reference and display the corresponding content. This approach is particularly useful when localizing content, allowing teams to manage translations easily. By separating content from the code, developers can easily swap out language-specific strings without disrupting the application.


How to use this plugin

This plugin requires some initial manual setup to link unique IDs with content. Once configured, you can quickly copy and paste all your content strings!


The plugin scans text layers on the current Figma page for content strings that match the prefix of the unique ID you define (e.g., “content_string_”).


For example, if your content strings begin with “user.profile”, you’ll use that as your prefix.


  1. Example unique ID: user.profile.settings.modal.description
  2. Your search prefix: user.profile


Ensure the full unique ID is used as the layer name for the corresponding text.


  1. Text layer name: user.profile.settings.modal.description


In summary

  1. Define a prefix for your content strings (e.g., “user.profile”).
  2. Ensure the full unique ID is used as the text layer name (e.g., “user.profile.settings.modal.description”).
  3. Enter your prefix and run a search.
  4. The plugin will scan the text layers and match content based on your prefix.
  5. Easily copy and paste the extracted content strings.
plugins.tagline: Extract content strings from you Figma files with unique IDs in layer names.

plugins.name: Harris Profile
plugins.description:
Evaluate Your Ideas According to What Matters Most to You

The Harris Profile Method is a powerful tool that enables you to evaluate your ideas and select the most suitable one. This plugin helps designers compare three ideas by scoring them based on prioritized criteria.


A Step-by-Step Guide

Write the titles of the three concepts you want to compare in the title sections above.


Determine up to 7 comparison criteria and list them in descending order of importance, from top to bottom.


During criterion evaluation, score each criterion separately for all three concepts. Possible scores are -2, -1, +1, +2:

  1. +2 if it greatly meets your requirements
  2. -2 if it doesn't meet them at all

Intermediate scores reflect partial alignment.


After scoring all criteria, examine the resulting pattern. The option with the highest green density in the top rows indicates the most suitable concept for you.


Changing the priority order of your criteria will alter the scoring pattern. To see which concept is more valuable in different situations, rearrange them with the desired criterion.


Use "Clear All Scores" to keep your concept names and criteria fixed while only clearing scores.


When ready, click the Insert button to paste the Harris Profile table directly onto your Figma canvas.


For inquiries or support, contact us at: harris.profile.plugin@gmail.com


The Harris Profile as a Design Thinking Evaluation Method

The method is based on the following sources:


  1. HARRIS, John S. The Product Profile Chart: A Graphical Means of Appraising and Selecting New Products, 1961.
  2. ROOZENBURG, Norbert F.M.; EEKELS, Johannes. Product Design: Fundamentals and Methods, Wiley, 1995.


Method Card Toolkit

YouTube Overview Video
plugins.tagline: Score & Compare Ideas Based on Custom Criteria

plugins.name: Button States Generator
plugins.description:
Enhance your design workflow with the Button States Generator and create consistent, accessible button components effortlessly.


Overview


The Button States Generator is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the creation of button components with multiple states: Default, Hover, Active, Focus, Selected, and Disabled.


Features


- Dynamic Button Creation: Generate button components with customizable dimensions, radius, paddings & colors

- State Variants: Automatically create and manage button states including Default, Hover, Active, Focus, Selected, and Disabled.

- Color Customization: Easily adjust each state colors, with options to randomize or reset to default.

- Contrast Checker: Built-in contrast checker ensures your design meets WCAG standards for accessibility.

- Icon Placement Options: Choose from multiple icon placement options (none, left, right, or icon-only) as a component property.


How to Use


Assuming you already have your button design ready:


1. Select button Frame: Start by selecting the frame of your button.

2. Customize Settings (optional): Use the plugin's UI to adjust dimensions, colors, and other settings if necessary.

3. Choose Icon Placement (optional): Select the icon placement option from the dropdown menu (none, left, right, or icon-only).

4. Generate Components: Click 'Create Component' to generate the button variants.


Note: This will not work if you select a pre-existing component. If your button is a component, detach it to convert it into a Frame.


Component Properties


The generated button component includes these useful properties:


- States: Choose between Default, Hover, Focus, Selected, and Disabled states

- Icon: Control icon placement (None, Left, Right, Only)

- Colors: Adjust text and background colors for each state

- Dimensions: Fine-tune sizing, radius and padding


Support


For any questions or support, please contact luc.hespel@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Generate Button component with variants / states instantly

plugins.description:
Custom Color System


Transform a single color into a fully branded, accessible design system by generating color scales and organizing them into an intuitive semantic structure for effortless implementation.

  2. Automatic color harmonies with proper contrast ratios
  3. Light & dark theme support
  4. Organized semantic color variables ready to use
  5. Optional advanced mode for granular control
  6. Built on Radix Colors for reliable accessibility
